import React from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router"; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { addcart } from '../actions' function Detail({ products }) { const { id } = useParams() const dispatch = useDispatch() return (

{products[id].name}

{products[id].price}

{products[id].description}

Stock : {products[id].quantity}

); } Detail.propTypes = { products: PropTypes.array.isRequired }; export default Detail
